titles: The first tome or volume of the Paraphrase of Erasmus vpon the Newe Testamente
Paraphrases in Novum Testamentum. Vol. 1. English. 1548
author: Erasmus, Desiderius, d. 1536.
Udall, Nicholas, 1505-1556.
date: the last daie of Januarie, 1548 [31 Jan. 1548]
publisher: Enpriented at London in Fletestrete at the signe of the Sunne by Edwarde Whitchurche,
notes: Translated from Latin by Nicholas Udall; includes text of Great Bible version of New Testament--Cf. NUC pre-1956 imprints.
